judges: Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and Barbieri, JJ.
The former Mr. Chief Justice Bell and the former Mr. Justice Barbieri took no part in the decision of this case.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Judgment affirmed. See Commonwealth v. Pierce, 437 Pa. 266, 263 A. 2d 350 (1970).
The former Mr. Chief Justice Bell and the former Mr. Justice Barbieri took no part in the decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Alfred P. Filippone and Neil H. Stein, for appellant.

James J. Wilson sané Milton M. Stein, Assistant District Attorneys, James D. Crawford, Deputy District Attorney, Richard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Logan, Appellant.
Submitted November 8, 1971.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and Barbieri, JJ.
Alfred P. Filippone and Neil H. Stein, for appellant.
James J. Wilson sané Milton M. Stein, Assistant District Attorneys, James D. Crawford, Deputy District Attorney, Richard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
March 20, 1972:
